verses.verse: וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וַיְדַבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> and spake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> unto all Israel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> about בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old מֵאָה֩ <S%H3967><s%> unto them I [am] an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty שָׁנָ֤ה <S%H8141><s%> years אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> I am no אוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> I can ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer לָצֵ֣את <S%H3318><s%> no more go out וְלָב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> and come in וַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> also the LORD אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> hath said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> I am no תַעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> unto me Thou shalt not go over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> this Jordan הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God ה֣וּא ׀ <S%H1931><s%> who עֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> he will go over לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> He יַשְׁמִ֞יד <S%H8045><s%> thee [and] he will destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> these nations הָאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these מִלְּפָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> from before וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֑ם <S%H3423><s%> thee and thou shalt possess יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <S%H3091><s%> them [and] Joshua ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> who עֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> he shall go over לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> hath said יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> thee as the LORD

וְעָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> shall do יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לָהֶ֔ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> when עָשָׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> unto them as he did לְסִיח֥וֹן <S%H5511><s%> to Sihon וּלְע֛וֹג <S%H5747><s%> and to Og מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> kings הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites וּלְאַרְצָ֑ם <S%H776><s%> and unto the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> when הִשְׁמִ֖יד <S%H8045><s%> of them whom he destroyed אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וּנְתָנָ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> shall give them up יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לִפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> before your face וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <S%H6213><s%> that ye may do לָהֶ֔ם כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַמִּצְוָ֔ה <S%H4687><s%> unto them according unto all the commandments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֖יתִי <S%H6680><s%> which I have commanded אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

חִזְק֣וּ <S%H2388><s%> Be strong וְאִמְצ֔וּ <S%H553><s%> and of a good courage אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְא֥וּ <S%H3372><s%> fear וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעַרְצ֖וּ <S%H6206><s%> not nor be afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> of them כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> who הַהֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> he [it is] that doth go עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> He will not יַרְפְּךָ֖ <S%H7503><s%> with thee he will not fail וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or יַעַזְבֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H5800><s%> thee nor forsake פ

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לִֽיהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> to him לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> unto him in the sight כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of all Israel חֲזַ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> Be strong וֶאֱמָץ֒ <S%H553><s%> and of a good courage כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you תָּבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> for thou must go אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> with this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <S%H7650><s%> hath sworn יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> unto their fathers לָתֵ֣ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָהֶ֑ם וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> and you תַּנְחִילֶ֥נָּה <S%H5157><s%> them and thou shalt cause them to inherit אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַֽיהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD ה֣וּא ׀ <S%H1931><s%> who הַהֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> he [it is] that doth go לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> He will not יַרְפְּךָ֖ <S%H7503><s%> thee he will be with thee he will not fail וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יַֽעַזְבֶ֑ךָּ <S%H5800><s%> thee neither forsake לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> thee fear וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵחָֽת׃ <S%H2865><s%> not neither be dismayed

וַיִּכְתֹּ֣ב <S%H3789><s%> wrote מֹשֶׁה֮ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתּוֹרָ֣ה <S%H8451><s%> this law הַזֹּאת֒ <S%H2063><s%> likewise וַֽיִּתְּנָ֗הּ <S%H5414><s%> and delivered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> it unto the priests בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons לֵוִ֔י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi הַנֹּ֣שְׂאִ֔ים <S%H5375><s%> which bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֖וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זִקְנֵ֖י <S%H2205><s%> and unto all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיְצַ֥ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אוֹתָ֣ם <S%H853><s%> לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> them saying מִקֵּ֣ץ ׀ <S%H7093><s%> At the end שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> of [every] seven שָׁנִ֗ים <S%H8141><s%> years בְּמֹעֵ֛ד <S%H4150><s%> in the solemnity שְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> of the year הַשְּׁמִטָּ֖ה <S%H8059><s%> of release בְּחַ֥ג <S%H2282><s%> in the feast הַסֻּכּֽוֹת׃ <S%H5521><s%> of tabernacles

בְּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> is come כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> When all Israel לֵרָאוֹת֙ <S%H7200><s%> to appear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחָ֑ר <S%H977><s%> which he shall choose תִּקְרָ֞א <S%H7121><s%> thou shalt read אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> this law הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> in נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> front כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> before all Israel בְּאָזְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H241><s%> in their hearing

הַקְהֵ֣ל <S%H6950><s%> together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> the people הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> the men וְהַנָּשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> and women וְהַטַּ֔ף <S%H2945><s%> and children וְגֵרְךָ֖ <S%H1616><s%> and thy stranger אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H8179><s%> that [is] within thy gates לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> so יִשְׁמְע֜וּ <S%H8085><s%> that they may hear וּלְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> so יִלְמְד֗וּ <S%H3925><s%> and that they may learn וְיָֽרְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> and fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְשָׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> and observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> all the words הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> of this law הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וּבְנֵיהֶ֞ם <S%H1121><s%> And [that] their children אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not יָדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> which have not known יִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> [any thing] may hear וְלָ֣מְד֔וּ <S%H3925><s%> and learn לְיִרְאָ֖ה <S%H3372><s%> to fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> long הַיָּמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> as long as אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּ֤ם <S%H859><s%> you חַיִּים֙ <S%H2416><s%> ye live עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who אַתֶּ֜ם <S%H859><s%> you עֹבְרִ֧ים <S%H5674><s%> whither ye go over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֛ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> to possess פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold קָרְב֣וּ <S%H7126><s%> approach יָמֶיךָ֮ <S%H3117><s%> Behold thy days לָמוּת֒ <S%H4191><s%> that thou must die קְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> call אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua וְהִֽתְיַצְּב֛וּ <S%H3320><s%> and present בְּאֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> yourselves in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וַאֲצַוֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H6680><s%> that I may give him a charge וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וִֽיהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> and Joshua וַיִּֽתְיַצְּב֖וּ <S%H3320><s%> and presented בְּאֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> themselves in the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וַיֵּרָ֧א <S%H7200><s%> appeared יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בָּאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle בְּעַמּ֣וּד <S%H5982><s%> in a pillar עָנָ֑ן <S%H6051><s%> of a cloud וַיַּעֲמֹ֛ד <S%H5975><s%> stood עַמּ֥וּד <S%H5982><s%> and the pillar הֶעָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> of the cloud עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> over the door הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses הִנְּךָ֥ <S%H2009><s%> Behold שֹׁכֵ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> Behold thou shalt sleep עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> with thy fathers וְקָם֩ <S%H6965><s%> will rise up הָעָ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> and this people הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> and this וְזָנָ֣ה ׀ <S%H2181><s%> and go a whoring אַחֲרֵ֣י ׀ <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the gods נֵֽכַר־ <S%H5236><s%> of the strangers הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> of which ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> they בָא־ <S%H935><s%> whither they go שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> into בְּקִרְבּ֔וֹ <S%H7130><s%> [to be] among וַעֲזָבַ֕נִי <S%H5800><s%> them and will forsake וְהֵפֵר֙ <S%H6565><s%> me and break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִ֔י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּרַ֖תִּי <S%H3772><s%> which I have made אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וְחָרָ֣ה <S%H2734><s%> shall be kindled אַפִּ֣י <S%H639><s%> Then my anger ב֣וֹ בַיּוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> against them in that day הַ֠הוּא <S%H1931><s%> and I וַעֲזַבְתִּ֞ים <S%H5800><s%> and I will forsake וְהִסְתַּרְתִּ֨י <S%H5641><s%> them and I will hide פָנַ֤י <S%H6440><s%> my face מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become לֶֽאֱכֹ֔ל <S%H398><s%> from them and they shall be devoured וּמְצָאֻ֛הוּ <S%H4672><s%> shall befall רָע֥וֹת <S%H7451><s%> evils רַבּ֖וֹת <S%H7227><s%> and many וְצָר֑וֹת <S%H6869><s%> and troubles וְאָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> them so that they will say בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הֲלֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> not עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> else אֱלֹהַי֙ <S%H430><s%> upon us because our God בְּקִרְבִּ֔י <S%H7130><s%> [is] not among מְצָא֖וּנִי <S%H4672><s%> come הָרָע֥וֹת <S%H7451><s%> Are not these evils הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וְאָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I הַסְתֵּ֨ר <S%H5640><s%> closed up אַסְתִּ֤יר <S%H5641><s%> And I will surely פָּנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> my face בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> for all the evils אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> which they shall have wrought כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> in that פָנָ֔ה <S%H6437><s%> they are turned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <S%H312><s%> unto other

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now כִּתְב֤וּ <S%H3789><s%> Now therefore write לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשִּׁירָ֣ה <S%H7892><s%> ye this song הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> yourselves וְלַמְּדָ֥הּ <S%H3925><s%> for you and teach אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> it the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שִׂימָ֣הּ <S%H7760><s%> put בְּפִיהֶ֑ם <S%H6310><s%> it in their mouths לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> so תִּהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִּ֜י הַשִּׁירָ֥ה <S%H7892><s%> that this song הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> may be a לְעֵ֖ד <S%H5707><s%> may be a witness בִּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> for me against the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֲבִיאֶ֜נּוּ <S%H935><s%> For when I shall have brought אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאֲדָמָ֣ה ׀ <S%H127><s%> them into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> which I sware לַאֲבֹתָ֗יו <S%H1><s%> unto their fathers זָבַ֤ת <S%H2100><s%> that floweth חָלָב֙ <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבַ֔שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey וְאָכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> and they shall have eaten וְשָׂבַ֖ע <S%H7646><s%> and filled וְדָשֵׁ֑ן <S%H1878><s%> themselves and waxen fat וּפָנָ֞ה <S%H6437><s%> then will they turn אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֱלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִים֙ <S%H312><s%> unto other וַעֲבָד֔וּם <S%H5647><s%> and serve וְנִ֣אֲצ֔וּנִי <S%H5006><s%> them and provoke וְהֵפֵ֖ר <S%H6565><s%> me and break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִֽי׃ <S%H1285><s%> my covenant

וְ֠הָיָה <S%H1961><s%> shall come כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when תִמְצֶ֨אןָ <S%H4672><s%> are befallen אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> רָע֣וֹת <S%H7451><s%> evils רַבּוֹת֮ <S%H7227><s%> And it shall come to pass when many וְצָרוֹת֒ <S%H6869><s%> and troubles וְ֠עָנְתָה <S%H6030><s%> shall testify הַשִּׁירָ֨ה <S%H7892><s%> them that this song הַזֹּ֤את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> against לְעֵ֔ד <S%H5707><s%> them as a witness כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> when לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשָּׁכַ֖ח <S%H7911><s%> for it shall not be forgotten מִפִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> out of the mouths זַרְע֑וֹ <S%H2233><s%> of their seed כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> when יָדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> for I know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִצְר֗וֹ <S%H3336><s%> their imagination אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> they עֹשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> which they go about הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> even now בְּטֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before אֲבִיאֶ֔נּוּ <S%H935><s%> before I have brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them into the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבָּֽעְתִּי׃ <S%H7650><s%> which I sware

וַיִּכְתֹּ֥ב <S%H3789><s%> therefore wrote מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשִּׁירָ֥ה <S%H7892><s%> this song הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the same day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> the same וַֽיְלַמְּדָ֖הּ <S%H3925><s%> and taught אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> it the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיְצַ֞ו <S%H6680><s%> a charge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> And he gave Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נ֗וּן <S%H5126><s%> of Nun וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> and said חֲזַ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> Be strong וֶֽאֱמָץ֒ <S%H553><s%> and of a good courage כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you תָּבִיא֙ <S%H935><s%> for thou shalt bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> which I sware לָהֶ֑ם וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I אֶֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> It

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came כְּכַלּ֣וֹת <S%H3615><s%> had made an end מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And it came to pass when Moses לִכְתֹּ֛ב <S%H3789><s%> of writing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words הַתּוֹרָֽה־ <S%H8451><s%> of this law הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֑פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in a book עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until תֻּמָּֽם׃ <S%H8552><s%> until they were finished

לָקֹ֗חַ <S%H3947><s%> Take אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> סֵ֤פֶר <S%H5612><s%> this book הַתּוֹרָה֙ <S%H8451><s%> of the law הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְשַׂמְתֶּ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> and put אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> מִצַּ֛ד <S%H6654><s%> it in the side אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> of the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְהָֽיָה־ <S%H1961><s%> may remain שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there בְּךָ֖ לְעֵֽד׃ <S%H5707><s%> that it may be there for a witness
